Player History
Drafted in 42nd round, 659th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2015...
Was claimed off waivers by New York on 4/7/2015.
Earned first career win on 5/9/2015...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 2/6/2016 to a 4-year deal worth $1,501,000 per year...
Injured on 6/14/2016 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 6 weeks...
Traded from New York to Atlanta on 5/1/2017 (Going to ATL: 3B Motokurou Tadayuki, P William Kinch, P Ronald Lebowitz. Going to NY: CF Issac Scott)...
Was claimed off waivers by St. Louis (C) on 6/10/2017.
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/4/2020 to a 3-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
